programme.title: Scalps
programme.desc: The commander of a Texan fort in the Civil War refuses to surrender to the Northerners, and tries to buy the local Indian tribe chief's daughter. The sage man refuses, and the Southerners massacre the tribe and abduct the young squaw anyway. The noble squaw manages to escape, and hides out with a rough rancher, who dislikes Indians, but hates the Southerners more. The odd couple joins forces, and tactics, to exert ultimate vengeance on the men at the fort.

programme.title: More Dollars for the MacGregors
programme.desc: Forsythe, who uses his wife as bait, has gained a reputation as a gunslinger.

programme.title: Kill Django... Kill First
programme.desc: Johnny MaGee arrives in a mining town and clashes with banker Anthony Burton, who uses underhanded tactics to acquire gold mines. As Burton manipulates the locals, including offering to wipe out a doctor’s debts in exchange for his sister’s marriage, Johnny finds an ally in bounty hunter Ted. But Burton’s reach goes far beyond the mines.

programme.title: Django... Adios!
programme.desc: A gunfighter forms a gang of "deceased" execution victims to get revenge on the politician and outlaw who killed his wife.

programme.title: Savage Pampas
programme.desc: In the late 1800's, an army captain tries to tame the open plains of Argentina which are dominated by Indians and bandits. To help do this, the captain brings in a party of women to keep his soldiers happy.

programme.title: A Minute to Pray, a Second to Die
programme.desc: In Tuscola, New Mexico, the Governor offers amnesty papers to all outlaws but gunfighter Clay McCord's appearance triggers a violent confrontation between the local marshal, McCord, and other outlaws.

programme.title: Cjamango
programme.desc: Just when Cjamango has won a bag of gold in a poker game, he is attacked by the gangs of El Tigre and Don Pablo.

programme.title: Sugar Colt
programme.desc: In order to avenge a friend and to fulfill his last wish, Rocco has to find out what happened to an army corps that has mysteriously disappeared. He therefore puts on the disguise of a doctor and starts investigating in a somewhat uncomfortable town.

programme.title: Taste of Killing
programme.desc: Dubious Bounty Killer Hank Fellows tracks bank stage coaches to observe them being robbed.

programme.title: You're Jinxed, Friend You've Met Sacramento
programme.desc: This fast-moving tale revolves around the kidnaping of a boxer's daughter. The boxer pays the ransom money but the girl is still not released. Her boyfriend decides to get her back his own way, killing her ruthless captor in a fierce duel.

programme.title: Djurado
programme.desc: Djurado is a gun-slinging professional gambler who struts into the small town of Silver Mine and wins half of the local saloon, the other part of which belongs to Barbara, whilst battling notorious outlaw Tucan.

programme.title: Gentleman Killer
programme.desc: A border town is thrust into political chaos when a Mexican bandit targets US soldiers, killing them relentlessly. As tensions escalate between the US and Mexico, the bandit becomes a symbol of defiance. The town becomes a battleground, with both sides caught in a dangerous game of revenge and retaliation.

programme.title: Cry Blood Apache
programme.desc: Gang of sadistic cowboys let nothing stand in their way in their search for gold.

programme.title: Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: Bounty hunter Stan Ross arrives in Canyon City, drawn by a bank robbery. Hired by the town’s powerful banker Jefferson, he hunts down a gang of Mexican bandits - only to uncover shocking secrets. As Ross digs deeper, he realizes Jefferson’s grip on the town is far more dangerous than he thought.

programme.title: Companeros!
programme.desc: A Swedish arms dealer and a Mexican peon team up to rescue the intellectual leader of the Revolutionary cause, while taking part in numerous misadventures along the way.
